articles.title: Live news: US stocks fall short of record highs at close as inflation report looms - Financial Times
articles.content:
US stocks retreated from record high territory to close lower, with investors now turning their attention to the release of official US inflation data on Tuesday.

articles.description: The action, affecting firms such as Deliveroo and Uber Eats, is in a dispute over pay and conditions.
articles.content:
